welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ocean Pointe, one of the most charming cities in the United States! Known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Interisland Terminal
terminals.description: The interisland terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves flights between the Hawaiian islands.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

airports.airport_name: Kaneohe Bay MCAS (Marion E. Carl Field) Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport is a small building that houses check-in counters, security, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport is a smaller building used by private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
